dialogue.htmlContent:
[style.boldBrown(Dominion Express)]
Looking at the business card given to you by Natalya, you see that the delivery company which employs her as a 'Stable Mistress' is very near to where you're currently standing, and is open to visiting members of the public between the hours of #IF(game.isExtendedWorkTime()) [style.colourMinorGood([unit.time(6)]-[unit.time(22)])]. As the warehouse out of which this 'Dominion Express' operates is currently [style.colourGood(open)], you could head inside and see if you could arrange to meet the [natalya.race] again... #ELSE [style.colourMinorBad([unit.time(6)]-[unit.time(22)])]. As the warehouse out of which this 'Dominion Express' operates is currently [style.colourBad(closed)], you'll have to come back during opening hours if you wanted to meet the [natalya.race] again... #ENDIF

[style.italicsBad(Natalya's content is in a very rough state in this version! Only enter the warehouse and play through her content if you are prepared to see lots of placeholders! It will be finished for v0.3.8!)]

A small arcane device screwed to the wall detects that you're a filly, and after letting out a high-pitched beep, it projects a series of pink words into the air:
[style.italicsPink(Filly: [pc.name])]
[style.italicsPink(Filly points: [#SPECIAL_PARSE_0])]
[style.italicsPink(Wages ready for collection: [#SPECIAL_PARSE_1])]

Just as you start to turn away from the display, some additional words flash up underneath the others, but this time they're bright gold in colour:
[style.italicsGold(Promotion available!)]
[style.italicsGold(Report to Mistress Natalya!)]

Just as you start to turn away from the display, some additional words flash up underneath the others, but this time they're bright crimson in colour:
[style.italicsCrimson(Demotion required!)]
[style.italicsCrimson(Report to Mistress Natalya!)]

#VAR var collar = pc.getClothingInSlot(IS_NECK); #ENDVAR

Approaching the front entrance...

#IF(collar!=null && collar.getClothingType().getId()=="innoxia_neck_filly_choker")

One of the horse-girl receptionists tells you that there are centaurs waiting for relief in the stables, and so lets you in.

#ELSEIF(pc.hasQuest(QUEST_LINE_ROMANCE_NATALYA))

One of the horse-girl receptionists has been informed that you're training to be one of Natalya's fillies, and so lets you in.

#ELSE

One of the horse-girl receptionists stops you and demands ID.

#ENDIF
You show the receptionist the card Natalya gave you and she lets you in.
Having already let you in, the horse-girl receptionists pay you no notice and continue chatting amongst themselves.
A couple of the centaur slaves are walking down the corridor on their way out to Dominion to pick up or deliver cargo.
A couple of the centaur slaves are moving cargo in this area.
Looking through the office's windows, you see a dozen or so workers filling out forms or planning deliveries.

#VAR var collar = pc.getClothingInSlot(IS_NECK); #ENDVAR

A large annex connected to the main warehouse houses Dominion Express's centaur slaves. At least fifty stalls, looking almost exactly like the sort which you'd see in a regular stable, are located in this area.

If night, most of the lights are turned off, and many of the stalls are occupied by sleeping centaurs.

#IF(collar!=null && collar.getClothingType().getId()=="innoxia_neck_filly_choker") The centaur on guard duty sees you wearing a filly choker and lets you in. #ELSE The centaur on guard duty tells you that visitors aren't allowed into the stables proper. #ENDIF
You enter the stables proper. Wonder if you should search for a slave to service...
You decide to exit the stables...

You search for a [npc.race] who looks to be pent-up. After just a minute, you find one pacing back and forth in [npc.her] stall and offer to help [npc.herHim] get some release. [npc.She] pulls you into [npc.her] stall and tells you that [npc.she]'ll give you [#SPECIAL_PARSE_0] filly points if you make [npc.herHim] cum.

You dutifully kneel down to kiss [npc.her] asshole and show your submission to [npc.herHim], which is enough to give [npc.herHim] an erection. Asks how you intend to make [npc.herHim] cum...
You decide to relieve [npc.namePos] stress by using your mouth. Dropping down onto your knees, you take [npc.her] [npc.cock+] into your mouth and start sucking...

You decide to relieve [npc.namePos] stress by using your mouth. Dropping down onto your knees behind [npc.herHim], you reach down to start stroking [npc.her] [npc.cock+] as you bury your face in [npc.her] [npc.ass+] and start giving [npc.herHim] a rimjob...

You decide to relieve [npc.namePos] stress by offering [npc.herHim] the use of your ass. Turning around to present yourself to [npc.herHim], you're quickly mounted and having your [pc.asshole+] penetrated by [npc.her] [npc.cock+]...

Satisfied, [npc.name] makes you clean their cock with your mouth, before tossing [#SPECIAL_PARSE_0] small arcane beads at you and collapsing down onto the straw. The beads disintegrate into arcane energy and are absorbed into your filly collar.

#IF(game.getHourOfDay()<4 || game.getHourOfDay()>22) [npc.Name] shuffles up on [npc.her] straw bedding and offers you another couple of points if you sleep with [npc.herHim]. #ELSE [npc.Name] tells you that [npc.sheHas] got to do a delivery soon, so go and service some other slave. #ENDIF
You leave [npc.name] behind and exit the stall, before continuing out into the stables...
You accept [npc.namePos] offer of sleeping with [npc.herHim]. Lying down on the straw next to [npc.herHim], you fall asleep smelling of sex...

You wake up the next morning to [npc.name] standing up and stretching. Thanks you for spending the night with [npc.herHim] and says [npc.she] has to get to work. Gives you another two filly point beads and tells you to go and service another slave.

You dream of a big, fat horse-cock pushing against your [pc.lips] and smearing musky precum all over your face. Pushing against your mouth a couple of times, the [npc.race] manages to push the flared head of [npc.her] feral horse-cock into your mouth.

You suddenly wake to discover that [npc.name] is forcing [npc.her] cock into your mouth. Seeing you wake up, [npc.she] tells you to get sucking.

You dream of a big, fat horse-cock pushing against your [pc.asshole] and smearing musky precum all over your ass. Pushing against your rear entrance a couple of times, the [npc.race] manages to push the flared head of [npc.her] feral horse-cock into your asshole.

You suddenly wake to discover that [npc.name] has mounted you and is thrusting [npc.her] cock into your asshole. Seeing you wake up, [npc.she] tells you to take it.
You leave [npc.name] behind and exit the stall, before continuing out into the stables...
Left with little choice but to do as [npc.she] says, you continue sucking [npc.namePos] cock...
Left with little choice but to do as [npc.she] says, you start licking [npc.namePos] asshole...
Left with little choice but to do as [npc.she] says, you start pushing back into [npc.namePos] cock as [npc.she] fucks you...

Having had [npc.her] fun, [npc.name] makes you clean her cock before telling you that [npc.sheHas] got to get to work. Gives you another two filly point beads and tells you to go and service another slave...

Having had [npc.her] fun, [npc.name] makes you clean her cock before telling you that [npc.sheHas] got to get to work. Gives you another two filly point beads and tells you to go and service another slave...

Having had [npc.her] fun, [npc.name] makes you clean her cock before telling you that [npc.sheHas] got to get to work. Gives you another two filly point beads and tells you to go and service another slave...
You leave [npc.name] behind and exit the stall, before continuing out into the stables...
You decide to make use of the stable's shower facilities. Enter a stall and let the directed jets of water wash your body clean...

While the plaque on the door informs you that this office is home to 'Mistress Natalya', you can only see horse-morph and centaur office workers through the windows of the office. A door on the far side looks to lead to an inner-office, and you assume that Natalya must be in there.

#IF(game.getDialogueFlags().hasFlag(FLAG_natalyaBusy))

[style.italicsMinorBad(Having told you not to disturb her again until tomorrow, you know that you shouldn't enter Natalya's office...)]

#ENDIF

Before you can even think about entering the office, a small arcane device fixed to one side of the door starts emitting an annoying buzzing sound, which quickly attracts the attention of a nearby centaur slave. Quickly stepping up to you, he warns, [style.speechMasculine(Hey! That device going off means you're pregnant! I wouldn't go into that office if I was you; Mistress Natalaya despises pregnant people, and the very least she'll do is have you thrown out of here...)]

#IF(pc.isQuestCompleted(QUEST_LINE_ROMANCE_NATALYA)) #IF(pc.hasCompanions()) Knowing that [com.she]'ll have to wait outside, you tell your companion to remain in the corridor, before pushing open the door and entering the office. #ELSE You push open the door and enter the office. #ENDIF Being recognised as a qualified filly, the office works don't pay you much attention, leaving you to walk over to Natalya's office without escorting you. #ELSE #IF(pc.hasCompanions()) #IF(pc.hasQuest(QUEST_LINE_ROMANCE_NATALYA)) Knowing that [com.she]'ll have to wait outside, you tell your companion to remain in the corridor, before knocking on the door and entering the office. One of the workers leads you across the office to the door of Natalya's office. #ELSE You knock on the door and enter the office. One of the workers tells you that your companion has to wait outside, before leading you across the office to the door of Natalya's office. #ENDIF #ELSE You knock on the door and enter the office. One of the workers leads you across the office to the door of Natalya's office. #ENDIF #ENDIF

You knock on the door and enter Natalya's office.

#IF(game.getDialogueFlags().hasFlag(FLAG_natalyaInterviewFailed))

Natalya curtly greets you. Tells you that she has time to repeat your interview for the position of filly. Tells you to take a seat.

#ELSE

Natalya recognises you as 'Helena's slave'.

#IF(game.getDialogueFlags().hasFlag(FLAG_playerSubmittedToNatalya)) Says that you were a good slave to have submitted to her before. You will be getting more of her cock soon enough. #ELSE Says that she thinks you will make an acceptable filly. #ENDIF

Tells you that she has time to give you an interview for the position of filly, which involves sexually servicing centaur slaves. Tells you that she knows you'll love being her slaves' cum-dump and tells you to take a seat.

#ENDIF
Natalya curtly greets you and places the filly contract on the desk. Tells you to sign it or get out.

#IF(!pc.isQuestProgressGreaterThan(QUEST_LINE_ROMANCE_NATALYA, QUEST_ROMANCE_NATALYA_3_TRAINING_1)) #IF(!pc.isAbleToHaveRaceTransformed()) Natalya orders you self-transform into a taur. #ELSE #IF(pc.getRace()!=RACE_HORSE_MORPH && pc.getLegType().isLegConfigurationAvailable(LEG_CONFIGURATION_TAUR)) Natalya fetches a couple of transformation potions and asks if you want to be a centauress or a [pc.race] taur. #ELSE Natalya fetches a transformation potion and tells you that it's time to turn you into a centauress. #ENDIF #ENDIF #ELSE

#IF(pc.getLegConfiguration()!=LEG_CONFIGURATION_TAUR) Seeing that you no longer have a tuaric lower body, Natalya furiously scolds you. #ELSEIF(!pc.isFeminine()) Seeing that you are no longer feminine, Natalya furiously scolds you. #ELSEIF(pc.hasVagina()) Sensing that something's not quite right, Natalya has you present yourself to her, and she furiously scolds you when she sees that you have a pussy. #ELSE Sensing that something's not quite right, Natalya has you present yourself to her, and she furiously scolds you when she sees that you don't have a cock. #ENDIF

#ENDIF

#IF(!pc.isAbleToHaveRaceTransformed()) #IF(!pc.isAbleToSelfTransform()) As you are not able to be transformed via potions, and cannot self-transform, Natalya tells you to get out and only return when you've sorted yourself out. #ELSE Natalya orders you self-transform into a taur. #ENDIF #ELSE #IF(pc.getRace()!=RACE_HORSE_MORPH && pc.getLegType().isLegConfigurationAvailable(LEG_CONFIGURATION_TAUR)) Natalya fetches a couple of transformation potions and angrily asks if you want to be a centauress or a [pc.race] taur. #ELSE Natalya fetches a transformation potion and angrily tells you that it's time to turn you back into a centauress. #ENDIF #ENDIF
Natalya is pleased to see that you've transformed into [pc.a_gender] [pc.race]. Says that it's time to start your training.

Natalya says that it's time to continue your training. Today you will learn to love giving rimjobs.

Tells you to come and kneel down beside her.

Natalya says that it's time to finish your training. Today you will be performing anilingus on a slave while she fucks your ass. After that, the slave will fuck you.

Tells you to kneel down and wait while she fetches a slave.
Seeing that you're no longer wearing your filly choker, and that you cannot equip a new one, Natalya scolds you and throws you out.
Seeing that you're no longer wearing your filly choker, Natalya scolds you and fetches a new one from out of her desk.
Seeing that you've dyed your choker, Natalya scolds you and grabs a dye brush out of her desk.
Mistress Natalya praises you for gaining enough points to have your collar upgraded. Grabs a dye brush out of her desk.
Mistress Natalya says she is disappointed that you were unable to maintain your points. Tells you that you are to be demoted and grabs a dye brush out of her desk.

#VAR var collar = pc.getClothingInSlot(IS_NECK); #ENDVAR #IF(collar.getColour()==COLOUR_CLOTHING_GOLD)

Mistress Natalya greets you as one of her special gold fillies.

#IF(game.getDialogueFlags().hasFlag(FLAG_natalyaDailySex)) As she's already had sex with you today, she says that you'll have to come back tomorrow if you want some more of her. #ELSE Asks if you'd like to fuck her ass. #ENDIF

#ELSEIF(collar.getColour()==COLOUR_CLOTHING_SILVER)

Mistress Natalya greets you as one of her good silver fillies.

#IF(game.getDialogueFlags().hasFlag(FLAG_natalyaDailySex)) As she's already had sex with you today, she says that you'll have to come back tomorrow if you want some more of her. #ELSE Asks if you'd like her to mount you. #ENDIF

#ELSEIF(collar.getColour()==COLOUR_CLOTHING_BRONZE)

Mistress Natalya greets you as one of her promising bronze fillies.

#IF(game.getDialogueFlags().hasFlag(FLAG_natalyaDailySex)) As she's already had sex with you today, she says that you'll have to come back tomorrow if you want some more of her. #ELSE Asks if you'd like to suck her cock or get a taste of her ass. #ENDIF

#ELSE

Mistress Natalya greets you as one of her steel fillies.

Tells you that you need to go and service centaurs to climb the ranks if you ever want to get special rewards from her.

#ENDIF
You tell Natalya that you'll come back for an interview another time. She tells you to get out and not bother her until tomorrow.
You sit down and read over the contract.
Doing as you're told, you leave Natalya's office...
Doing as you're told, you set about transforming yourself into [style.a_shemale] [pc.race]...
You ask to be transformed into a centauress. Natalya makes you drink the potion to turn you into [style.a_shemale] [pc.race]...
You ask to keep your race. Natalya makes you drink the potion...
Not wanting to continue your training, you make an excuse and leave, much to Natalya's annoyance...
You exit the office and head back out into the warehouse...

Natalya subtracts 25 of your filly points, but even with this she says you're due for a promotion. The choker she straps around your neck has the word 'filly' spelt out in [#SPECIAL_PARSE_0] lettering.
Natalya subtracts 25 of your filly points, saying that you're now low enough to be demoted. The choker she straps around your neck has the word 'filly' spelt out in [#SPECIAL_PARSE_0] lettering.

Needs more 'fillies' (indentured servants) who can relieve stress for the slaves. Says she would have liked to enslave you, but their slave quota is already full, so you're being interviewed for a position as a filly, which is almost the same thing.

Doing as you're told you return to the other side of the desk and look down at the papers in front of you...

There's a lot of legal terminology, but Natalya points out the most important parts. First of all, the prerequisites for being a 'filly' at Dominion Express are that you are [style.a_shemale] taur, and that you complete your training under the stable Mistress.

You will be a non-exclusive, free-roaming indentured servant, meaning that while you are able to choose when and how often you work, there is never any requirement for Dominion Express to pay you anything. Your duties will be to service slaves, and while you are not entitled to any reward, Natalya informs you that there is a payment grade based on your 'filly points'. The colour of your filly choker reflects what grade you are on, and goes from steel to bronze to silver to gold.

Slaves earn points to give to fillies by working hard, and so you an earn points by pleasing them. If you ever need to be transformed back into [pc.a_shemale] taur or need to be given another choker, you will incur heavy point losses. You also lose two points every day, meaning that you need to stay active to retain your rank.

Natalya says she also offers personal rewards. After training is complete, she will not let you service her unless you are bronze. At silver, you can have her fuck you, and at gold she will let you mount her.

Says that seeing as you're already [pc.a_shemale] [pc.race], there will be no need for transformations, so after you've signed, you can immediately move on to your first stage of training, which will be sucking a centaur slave's cock.

Tells you to sign it.

Says that she's looking forwards to seeing how you'll look as [pc.a_shemale] taur, so after you've signed, she'll have you immediately transformed and then you can immediately move on to your first stage of training, which will be sucking a centaur slave's cock.

Tells you to sign it.

You refuse to sign the contract. Natalya is extremely angry and throws you out, telling you to return when you've accepted your place.

You head back out into the warehouse.
